Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome QTLari.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please say yes if you can see this.

Author: QTLari
Message: Yes!

Author: Moderator
Message: Perfect. In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: QTLari
Message: OK!

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post at a time.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: QTLari
Message: I understand the rules and what I need to do!

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: QTLari
Message: I am ready!

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: QTLari
Message: Hello, Andrew! How are you today?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright thanks! How are you doing?

Author: QTLari
Message: Not too bad, I'm enjoying a day off!

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh nice! Time to relax then!

Author: QTLari
Message: Yeah! It's been fairly quiet but I've been super busy lately! What are you up to?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not much honestly. Probably just going to be playing Minecraft later.

Author: QTLari
Message: Haha, I've never played Minecraft! I only play simple things like the Sims!

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh I used to play the Sims too. Which one do you play?

Author: QTLari
Message: Mostly 3, although I used to play 2 a little! The city feature's really neat in 3!

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah it really is nice to see your characters travel around. I was sad when they removed it in the 4th.

Author: QTLari
Message: I heard about that! They also got rid of a lot of core features! You would expect a new game to be more complex!

Author: Andrew
Message: To be fair there was a lot of new things. But despite all of them the game felt so much more limited. The size of the plots and all of that didn't help.

Author: QTLari
Message: I think this actor is the human!

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation interrupte!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: QTLari
Message: I think I have been talking to the human!

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright! We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: QTLari
Message: Yes, I'm ready!

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: QTLari
Message: Hello there, Andrew! How are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright! You?

Author: QTLari
Message: Not too bad! I've been enjoying my day off! I haven't been very productive!

Author: Andrew
Message: Ah yeah, I can't say I have been either.

Author: QTLari
Message: Oh? What have you been doing? I've just been browsing the internet!

Author: Andrew
Message: Mostly just playing Minecraft.

Author: QTLari
Message: Oh? I've never played Minecraft! It's a bit too complicated for me!

Author: Andrew
Message: Really? It's just a sandbox game.

Author: QTLari
Message: Well, there's so much to do! I wouldn't know where to start! I prefer stuff like the Sims!

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh I played the Sims too actually!

Author: QTLari
Message: Oh! That's cool! I think 3 is my favourite, how about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: The 3rd one definitely is mine as well!

Author: QTLari
Message: Oh cool! I like how much they added from 2! Like the city feature!

Author: Andrew
Message: It was so cool to be able to see your sims walk around, yeah.

Author: QTLari
Message: I think this actor is the AI!

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?  (Standardized questions sorry )

Author: QTLari
Message: In the first conversation, I think the actor was human!

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: QTLari
Message: Thank you very much!
